thread.title: Willem Dafoe believes each of his alpacas has a human-like 'personality'

author: Bang Showbiz
title: Willem Dafoe believes each of his alpacas has a human-like 'personality'
text:
Willem Dafoe believes each of his alpacas has a human-like 'personality'
- Bang Showbiz
-
- Updated
0
Tags
As featured on
Opening up about how he loves keeping animals for their "company" at his farm house in Italy, Willem Dafoe admitted he believes each of his alpacas has a human-like "personality".
